---
name: "Feature: Customizable Sections for Activities"
about: "Enable users to add custom sections (e.g., achievements, roles) to their activity participation."
title: "[Feature] Customizable Sections for Activities"
labels: [enhancement]
assignees: ''
---

## Problem
Students may want to highlight specific achievements or roles in their activity participation.

## Proposal
- Allow users to add custom sections or notes to their activity records (e.g., achievements, leadership roles).
- Store these in the user profile or activity record.

## Benefits
- More personalized and meaningful activity records.
- Useful for resumes and applications.

## Additional Context
Inspired by the Cover Letter Generator project.
